name: Death Drive: A Deck-Building Open World Survival RPG
name_original: Death Drive: A Deck-Building Open World Survival RPG
description:
Death Drive is a deck-building open world survival RPG set in a zombie apocalypse. It's a fresh take on the genre, combining in-depth turn based combat of card battlers and deck building, open world exploration, all your favorite skills and character abilities, loot, trading, crafting, managing your caravan and survival all together!

  • Huge open world: explore the world map, travel to different settlements filled with all kinds of interactions, quests and dangerous threats.
  • Build your character: from attributes and skills to perks and deck, build your character the way you want. A lock-picking expert specializing in explosives? You can. Maybe an unarmed combat champion with zero intelligence? Not a problem.
  • In-depth combat system: Death Drive takes all the best from card battlers and turn based combat, resulting in a combat system that's fun and challenging.
  • Trading & loot: dive into a post-apocalyptic economy to figure out best ways to earn coin, find sweet loot and upgrade your equipment.
  • Crafting & mods: because no one is selling ready-made baseball bats with nails.
  • Team & caravan management: build and upgrade your mobile camp, manage your team and embark on an epic journey.
  • Classic survival: maintain your sanity while scavenging for necessities.
